content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you in need of HVAC, plumbing, or electrical service?
Hi, I was having an issue with my AC and thought about booking someone but actually, I think I'm going to try fixing it myself first. Thanks though.
No problem at all! If you decide you need our help after all, just reach out and weâ€™ll be happy to assist. Good luck with your AC, and let us know if you have any questions!
reason: Customer decided to handle the issue themselves.
